tests.title: UPSC CDS 01/2026: CT 01: Cell
tests.description: Structure of cell, cell organelles, prokaryotic & eukaryotic cells, basic functions.

tests.title: CT 02: Animal & Plant Tissue
tests.description: Types of plant and animal tissues and their functions.

tests.title: CT 03: Animal & Plant Nutrition
tests.description: Modes of nutrition, photosynthesis, human nutrition basics.

tests.title: CT 04: Respiratory, Circulatory & Skeletal System
tests.description: Human breathing process, blood circulation, heart, bones & joints.

tests.title: CT 05: Digestive & Excretory System
tests.description: Human digestive organs, digestion process, excretion mechanisms.

tests.title: CT 06: Nervous & Endocrine System
tests.description: Brain, spinal cord, nerves, hormones & endocrine glands.

tests.title: CT 07: Matter & Its Properties
tests.description: States of matter, physical & chemical properties.

tests.title: CT 08: Atom & Molecules
tests.description: Structure of atom, molecules, chemical formulae.

tests.title: CT 09: Chemical Reaction
tests.description: Types of reactions, equations, reactants & products.

tests.title: CT 10: Acid, Base & Salts
tests.description: Properties, pH, neutralization reactions.

tests.title: CT 11: Metal & Non-Metals
tests.description: Chemical & physical properties, reactions.

tests.title: CT 12: Carbon & Compounds
tests.description: Carbon bonding, hydrocarbons, basic organic compounds.

tests.title: CT 13: Units & Measurement
tests.description: SI units, measurement tools, accuracy & errors.

tests.title: CT 14: Force & Motion
tests.description: Newton’s laws, types of motion, speed, velocity, acceleration.

tests.title: CT 15: Electricity & Magnetism
tests.description: Electric current, resistance, magnetic effects of current.

tests.title: CT 16: Gravitation
tests.description: Universal law of gravitation, mass, weight, free fall.

tests.title: CT 17: Work, Power & Energy
tests.description: Work done, power, forms of energy, energy transformation.

tests.title: CT 18: Fluid Mechanics
tests.description: Pressure, buoyancy, Archimedes’ principle.

tests.title: CT 19: Wave
tests.description: Types of waves, frequency, amplitude, wave speed.

tests.title: CT 20: Optics
tests.description: Reflection, refraction, lenses, mirrors.

tests.title: CT 21: Heat & Thermodynamics
tests.description: Heat transfer, temperature, laws of thermodynamics.

tests.title: CT 22: Electricity
tests.description: Ohm’s law, electric power, circuits, resistors.

tests.title: CT 23: Magnetic Effects of Electric Current
tests.description: Magnetic field & field lines, right-hand thumb rule, electromagnets, induction, basic circuit safety.

tests.title: CT 24: Improvement in Food Resources
tests.description: Crop improvement, fertilizers, irrigation, disease control, animal husbandry.

tests.title: CT 25: Our Environment
tests.description: Ecosystem, food chains, waste management, pollution, global warming.

tests.title: CT 1: Art and Culture - Music
tests.description: Indian classical music (Hindustani & Carnatic), major gharanas, folk music traditions, important musical instruments.

tests.title: CT 2: Art and Culture - Tribes in India
tests.description: Major tribes of India, their culture, location, lifestyle, art and handicrafts, tribal festivals.

tests.title: CT 3: Art and Culture - Architecture
tests.description: Harappan, Buddhist, temple architecture (Nagara, Dravida, Vesara), Indo-Islamic architecture, Mughal & Rajput styles.

tests.title: CT 4: Art and Culture - Dances
tests.description: Classical dances (Bharatanatyam, Kathak, Odissi etc.), folk dances of states, basic features & origin.

tests.title: CT 5: Art and Culture - Fairs and Festivals
tests.description: National and state festivals, cultural fairs, harvest festivals, tribal festivals.

tests.title: CT 6: Art and Culture - Language and Literature
tests.description: Classical languages, ancient & medieval literature, major literary works, authors, scripts.

tests.title: CT 7: Art and Culture - Philosophy
tests.description: Major schools: Vedanta, Sankhya, Yoga, Nyaya, Buddhism, Jainism; key texts & concepts.

tests.title: CT 8: Art and Culture - Religion
tests.description: Major religions of India, beliefs, practices, important texts, cultural impact.

tests.title: CT 9: Art and Culture - Indian Sculpture and Different Schools of Art
tests.description: Mauryan art, Gandhara, Mathura, Amaravati schools, Chola bronzes, regional traditions.

tests.title: CT 1: Ancient History - Indus Valley Civilization
tests.description: Town planning, seals, pottery, script, economy, social life, major sites like Harappa, Mohenjo-Daro, Dholavira.

tests.title: CT 2: Ancient History - Vedic Age
tests.description: Early & later Vedic society, economy, polity, religion, literature (Vedas, Brahmanas), differences between early and later Vedic phases.

tests.title: CT 3: Ancient History - Buddhism
tests.description: Life of Buddha, Four Noble Truths, Eightfold Path, councils, spread of Buddhism, major sects (Hinayana, Mahayana).

tests.title: CT 4: Ancient History - Jainism
tests.description: Mahavira’s teachings, Triratna, Jain councils, spread, Jain literature, sects (Digambar, Shvetambar).

tests.title: CT 5: Ancient History - Mauryan Empire
tests.description: Chandragupta Maurya, Megasthenes, administration, economy, Ashoka and Dhamma policy.

tests.title: CT 6: Ancient History - Post Mauryan Age
tests.description: Indo-Greeks, Shakas, Parthians, Kushanas; trade, art (Gandhara, Mathura).

tests.title: CT 7: Ancient History - Gupta Age
tests.description: Golden Age features, literature, science, art, administration, major rulers.

tests.title: CT 8: Ancient History - Post Guptas Age
tests.description: Harsha, regional kingdoms, socio-economic changes.

tests.title: CT 9: Ancient History - Travellers in Ancient India
tests.description: Megasthenes, Fa-Hien, Hiuen Tsang, their accounts on society, culture and administration.

tests.title: CT 1: Medieval History - Delhi Sultanate
tests.description: Slave, Khalji, Tughlaq, Sayyid and Lodi dynasties; administration, reforms, economy, culture, major rulers.

tests.title: CT 2: Medieval History - Mughal Empire
tests.description: Babur to Aurangzeb; Mansabdari system, administration, art, architecture, expansion, decline factors.

tests.title: CT 3: Medieval History - Later Mughals
tests.description: Decline of Mughal power, rise of regional states, invasions of Nadir Shah & Ahmad Shah Abdali.

tests.title: CT 4: Medieval History - Imperial Cholas
tests.description: Chola administration, navy, temple architecture, local governance, Rajaraja & Rajendra Chola achievements.

tests.title: CT 5: Medieval History - Maratha Empire
tests.description: Shivaji’s administration, Maratha confederacy, Peshwas, battles with Mughals & British, decline.

tests.title: CT 6: Medieval History - Kingdoms in South India
tests.description: Chalukyas, Rashtrakutas, Hoysalas, Vijayanagar Empire; art, culture, administration.

tests.title: CT 7: Medieval History - Bhakti Movement and Major Bhakti Saints
tests.description: Ramanuja, Kabir, Nanak, Mirabai, Chaitanya; teachings, impact on society & religion.

tests.title: CT 8: Medieval History - Books and Author of Medieval India
tests.description: Important medieval texts: Ain-i-Akbari, Akbarnama, Tuzuk-i-Baburi, works of Amir Khusro etc.

tests.title: CT 1: Modern History - Advent of Europeans
tests.description: Arrival of Portuguese, Dutch, English, French; trading centres; early conflicts; establishment of British power.

tests.title: CT 2: Modern History - Rise and Expansion of British East India Company (1600-1856 AD)
tests.description: Battle of Plassey, Buxar, annexations, Subsidiary Alliance, Doctrine of Lapse, administrative expansion.

tests.title: CT 3: Modern History - The Great Revolt of 1857
tests.description: Causes, major centres, leaders, events, suppression, consequences.

tests.title: CT 4: Modern History - National movement (1858 - 1919)
tests.description: Formation of INC, moderate–extremist phase, Swadeshi, Partition of Bengal, Home Rule Movement.

tests.title: CT 5: Modern History - National movement (1919 - 1939)
tests.description: Rowlatt Act, Jallianwala Bagh, Non-Cooperation, Civil Disobedience, Round Table Conferences, Government of India Act 1935.

tests.title: CT 6: Modern History - Freedom to Partition (1939-1947)
tests.description: WWII impact, Quit India Movement, Cripps Mission, Cabinet Mission, Mountbatten Plan, partition.

tests.title: CT 7: Modern History - Other Important Movements
tests.description: Peasant, tribal, labour movements; revolutionary movements

tests.title: CT 8: Modern History - Viceroys and Governors
tests.description: Major viceroys, their policies, important reforms and events during their tenure.

tests.title: CT 9: Modern History - Socio - Religious Reform Movements
tests.description: Brahmo Samaj, Arya Samaj, Prarthana Samaj, Aligarh Movement, Ramakrishna Mission; key reformers.

tests.title: CT 1: Geography - Mapping and Location (World)
tests.description: Major latitudes and longitudes, continents & oceans, important world locations, map-based identification.

tests.title: CT 2: Geography - Mapping and Location (India)
tests.description: India’s location, neighbouring countries, important cities, rivers, mountains, map interpretation.

tests.title: CT 3: World Geography - Earth and Universe
tests.description: Solar system, planets, rotation & revolution, eclipses, seasons, Earth's shape and structure.

tests.title: CT 4: World Geography - Interior of the Earth
tests.description: Crust, mantle, core, plate tectonics, earthquakes, volcanoes.

tests.title: CT 5: World Geography - Landforms and Physical Features
tests.description: Mountains, plateaus, plains, rivers, lakes, desert features, geomorphic processes.

tests.title: CT 6: World Geography - Oceanography
tests.description: Ocean currents, tides, waves, marine resources, ocean basins.

tests.title: CT 7: World Geography - Climatology
tests.description: Weather & climate, atmospheric circulation, winds, rainfall patterns, cyclones, climate controls.

tests.title: CT 8: World Geography - Climatic Regions of the World
tests.description: Köppen climate classification, tropical, temperate and polar regions, deserts, monsoon regions.

tests.title: CT 9: World Geography - Natural Vegetation and Wildlife
tests.description: Forest types, grasslands, deserts, tundra, wildlife distribution and biodiversity hotspots.

tests.title: CT 1: Indian Geography - India: Location & Size
tests.description: Location of India, latitudes & longitudes, size, boundaries.

tests.title: CT 2: Indian Geography - Physiographic Division of India
tests.description: Major physiographic divisions (Himalayas, Northern Plains, Peninsular Plateau, Coastal Plains, Islands).

tests.title: CT 3: Indian Geography - Indian Rivers and Water Resources
tests.description: River systems (Himalayan & Peninsular), major rivers, tributaries, watersheds, dams, irrigation projects, groundwater resources.

tests.title: CT 4: Indian Geography - Indian Climate
tests.description: Monsoon mechanism, seasons, rainfall distribution, climatic regions, factors affecting climate, El-Niño & La-Niña impacts.

tests.title: CT 5: Indian Geography - Soils of India
tests.description: Types of soils — alluvial, black, red, laterite, arid, mountain soil; soil formation, characteristics, soil erosion, conservation.

tests.title: CT 6: Indian Geography - Natural Vegetation and Wildlife of India
tests.description: Forest types (tropical, deciduous, mangrove), biodiversity hotspots, endangered species, wildlife sanctuaries, national parks.

tests.title: CT 7: Indian Geography - Agriculture in India
tests.description: Cropping seasons (Kharif, Rabi, Zaid), major crops, Green Revolution, irrigation methods, agricultural practices, fertilizers, MSP.

tests.title: CT 8: Indian Geography - Resources of India
tests.description: Mineral resources, power resources (coal, oil, gas, hydro, nuclear), distribution and production patterns.

tests.title: CT 1: Polity - Basics of Constitution
tests.description: Historical background, making of the Constitution, salient features, sources of Constitution.

tests.title: CT 2: Polity - Important Bills and Acts
tests.description: Major bills/acts related to governance, rights, reforms, economy, society.

tests.title: CT 3: Polity - Important Amendments
tests.description: Key constitutional amendments and their impact on governance.

tests.title: CT 4: Polity - Fundamental Rights
tests.description: Six fundamental rights, restrictions, writs, related articles.

tests.title: CT 5: Polity - Fundamental Duties
tests.description: 11 fundamental duties from Article 51A.

tests.title: CT 6: Polity - Directive Principles of State Policy
tests.description: Social, economic, Gandhian, and liberal principles guiding state policy.

tests.title: CT 7: Polity - President
tests.description: Election, powers, functions, veto types, ordinances, impeachment.

tests.title: CT 8: Polity - Parliament
tests.description: Lok Sabha, Rajya Sabha, powers, procedure, legislative process.

tests.title: CT 9: Polity - Central Government
tests.description: PM, Council of Ministers, Cabinet, ministries.

tests.title: CT 1: Economy - National Income Accounting
tests.description: GDP, GNP, NNP, methods of national income calculation.

tests.title: CT 2: Economy - Foreign Trade
tests.description: Imports, exports, balance of trade, balance of payments, major trading partners.

tests.title: CT 3: Economy - Money and Banking
tests.description: RBI, monetary policy, inflation, banking system, types of banks.

tests.title: CT 4: Economy - Government Budget and Fiscal Policy
tests.description: Tax revenue, expenditure, deficits, fiscal measures, budgeting process.

tests.title: CT 5: Economy - Taxation
tests.description: Direct and indirect taxes, GST, tax structure.

tests.title: CT 6: Economy - Sectors of Economy
tests.description: Primary, secondary and tertiary sectors, sectoral contributions, employment structure.

tests.title: CT 7: Economy - Industrial Sector
tests.description: Types of industries, industrial growth, major industrial regions, manufacturing sectors.

tests.title: CT 8: Economy - Agriculture
tests.description: Types of crops, agricultural practices, irrigation, productivity, MSP, fertilizers and challenges in Indian agriculture.

tests.title: CT 9: Economy - Infrastructure
tests.description: Transport, communication, energy, power, roads, railways and overall economic infrastructure.

tests.title: CT 1: Ecology and Environment - Wildlife Sanctuaries & Biosphere Reserves
tests.description: Important wildlife sanctuaries and biosphere reserves of India, their location, key species, conservation significance.

tests.title: CT 2: Ecology and Environment - National Park
tests.description: Important wildlife sanctuaries and biosphere reserves of India, their location, key species, conservation significance.

tests.title: CT 3: Ecology and Environment - Conservation efforts: India and World
tests.description: Major national parks of India, special features, species diversity, protected area network.

tests.title: CT 4: Ecology and Environment - Environmental Problems
tests.description: Conservation programs, environmental treaties, biodiversity protection measures, governmental initiatives.

tests.title: CT 5: Ecology and Environment - Environmental pollution
tests.description: Air, water, soil, noise pollution; global warming; ozone depletion; climate change; waste management issues.

tests.title: CT 6: Ecology and Environment - Conservation efforts: India and World
tests.description: Causes and effects of pollution, control measures, environmental laws, sustainable development.

tests.title: Static GK - Awards and Honours
tests.description: Major national & international awards, fields of awards, recent recipients, important recognitions.

tests.title: Static GK - Books and Authors
tests.description: Famous books, important authors, recent publications, books related to national/international events.

tests.title: Static GK - Committees and Recommendation
tests.description: Important government committees, chairpersons, objectives, major recommendations.

tests.title: Static GK - Days and Events
tests.description: Important national & international days, themes, global observances.

tests.title: Static GK - Defence- I
tests.description: Defence forces structure, commands, ranks, important exercises, weapons.

tests.title: Static GK - Defence- II
tests.description: Missiles, aircrafts, ships, defence organizations (DRDO, HAL), defence acquisitions.

tests.title: Static GK - Science Technology and Inventions
tests.description: Important inventions, inventors, technological developments, discoveries, ISRO achievements.

tests.title: Static GK - Sports
tests.description: Major tournaments, winners, venues, sports terms, awards (Arjuna, Khel Ratna).

tests.title: Static GK - International Organisations and Headquarters
tests.description: International organisations, headquarters, functions, founding year.
